title: Stevie Wonder (possibly by Letraset or Franklin)
content:
This is gonna bug the crap out of me. I feel like I've seen this type before. It has a sort of ITC Machine look with some shadow on the back. The image is from the early to mid 70's.

Font: 

 Jim Crow/Jim Dandy 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134036/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
